add.title: List Your Property
add.exitConfirmMessage: Your progress will be saved and you can continue later

intro.title: Let's get started
intro.description: We'll guide you through listing your property in just a few simple steps. You can save and exit at any time.
benefits: Set your own prices and house rules

propertyType.title: What type of property is this?
propertyType.description: Choose the option that best describes your place

guestAccess.title: What will guests have access to?
guestAccess.description: Let guests know what spaces they can use

location.title: Where's your property located?
location.description: Guests will only see your exact address after booking
location.confirmDescription: Make sure the pin is in the right spot. You can adjust it if needed.

details.title: Share some basics about your place
details.description: You can always change these later

photos.title: Add photos of your property
photos.description: Upload at least 5 photos. The first one will be your cover photo.
tips: Include different areas of your space

title.title: Give your property a title
title.description: Catch guests' attention with a catchy title

tags.title: Choose tags that describe your place

description.title: Describe your property
description.description: Tell guests what makes your place special
description.placeholder: Write about your space, neighborhood, and what guests can expect...

pricing.title: Set your pricing
pricing.competitiveTip: Price competitively to attract more bookings

discounts.title: Offer discounts to attract guests
discounts.description: Optional: Increase bookings with strategic discounts
discounts.newListing: New listing promotion (20% off first 3 bookings)

policies.title: Review your policies
policies.description: These are your default policies. You can customize them for this property.

hostInfo.title: Tell us about yourself
hostInfo.hostType: Are you listing as an individual or business?

safetyQuestions.title: Safety disclosures
safetyQuestions.weapons: Are there any weapons on the property?
safetyQuestions.cameras: Are there security cameras on the property?

review.title: Review & Publish
review.description: Take a final look before publishing your listing

success.title: Congratulations!
success.draft: Your property has been saved as a draft

errors.titleTooLong: Title must be 32 characters or less
errors.descriptionTooLong: Description must be 500 words or less
